name: Come Home (Abanamore)
description:
You are a little boy, and have just moved into a new home in a new neighborhood. Coming out of your house you discover everyone in your family has run off! Explore the neighborhood, get familiar with the locals, solve puzzles and convince your eccentric family to get their butts back to the house.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Interact: E or Space

Inventory/Pause: ESC or I

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2019 by: Delaney Stamper, Theo Kurokawa, Jack Kling, and Josh Baker.
